Daryl Ryan Tan

Hi, I'm Daryl.

I started this blog to write and reflect on my life, dealing with others, and about the books that I've read that helped inspire me.

I'm also starting a newsletter to share the books that I've read, reviewed and find worth reading. If you're interested, just email me with your email address and I will include you in my monthly newsletter.

The fruits of one's reading may be reduced to concrete form by one's pen - Seneca
